profile:
Pro-Loc Interlocking & Landscape Design is a privately owned company established in 2003. 
With an early focus on residential interlocking and landscaping contracts, Pro-Loc has matured into a full service residential and commercial interlocking company with expertise spanning all aspects of large-scale project disciplines. 
Today, we successfully manage commercial and residential interlocking and landscape design projects all across southern Ontario.

Pro-Loc Interlocking & Landscape Design is a multi-craft employer providing a wide variety of services ranging from individual turnkey installations to large-scale specialty subcontracting assignments including Interlock Paver Installation. 

When schedules matter, we offer a competitive advantage you can count on. We provide outstanding "backstage" support to our field operations helping projects run smoothly. 
In the field, we maintain a steady workforce of skilled craftsmen and project managers allowing projects to progress smoothly to completion.

Our craftsmen take great pride in both the quality of their work and the aesthetic beauty of the finished product. 

We are open for business and we are following all Covid-19 regulations.
service_area: Our service area within the GTA includes Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Georgetown, Brampton, Etobicoke, Woodbridge, Vaughan and Markham
services:
Driveways & Walkways
    Patios & Pool Decks
    Concrete & Retaining Walls
    Wash & Seal
    Pickups & Relay
    Landscape Design
    Boulder & Armor Stone Installation
    Gravel, Flagstone & Natural Stone
    Mulch, Sodding & Seeding

profile:
Mr. Interlock Landscape & Construction is a professional residential and commercial design and build firm servicing the York Region and Greater Toronto Area communities.
 
With over 30 years of experience in interlocking and paving installations, we help our clients create a distinctive design element that will magnify their homes allure, increase its value while offering a unique look customized to meet their landscape desires.
 
We take pride in providing our clients with original and timeless designs, innovative ideas, quality construction, prompt and professional service, outstanding warranty and seamless flow of project implementation from start to finish.
 
Our construction expertise spans across a variety of materials from natural stone, flagstone, marble to cobblestones, standard pavers, concrete and asphalt.
 
We also specialize in a variety of project types such as driveways, patios, stairs, retaining walls, swimming pools, outdoor kitchenettes, outdoor living spaces, outdoor lighting, outdoor audio and more.
 
Our mission is to enhance and beautify the communities we enter by supplying our clients with a uniquely designed landscape project that adheres to our motto "Do It Once, Do It Right". All while providing our clients with unparalleled service through our consultation, planning and execution resulting in long lasting relationships and an abundance of word of mouth referrals.

profile:
GroundScape Construction Inc. is an award-winning landscape company that focuses on creating outstanding retreats in the comfort of your backyard. Our company leverages garden design, water features, wood-work and the highest quality stones to create an environment of absolute serenity that meets your dreams.

Groundscape is the gateway to the perfect backyard. Our company has decades of experience and full control of the construction and design process to ensure all your needs are addressed with the highest standards of quality and perfection. 

"Perfecting the Art of Landscaping"

Services Include:
Complete Landscape Projects
Landscape Design and Re-Design
Garden Design & Installations
Landscape/Outdoor Lighting
Building & Construction
Landscaping/Grading/Excavation
Retaining Walls/Stone Feature Walls, Stone Columns
Interlocking Driveways,Patios, Pool Surrounds & Walkways 
Stonework
Flagstone Porches, Walkways, Patios & Pool Surrounds
Water Features
Fencing
Decks
Pergolas/Pavilions/Custom Sheds/Pool Cabanas
Concrete Work
Steps
Rock Features...and more!

profile:
At Hogan Landscaping, we make your ideal outdoor space a reality. We create exquisite landscapes you’ll appreciate time and time again with family and friends.
Hogan Landscaping is a company that’s driven by the satisfaction of creating outdoor spaces that each homeowner feels is a perfect reflection of their needs and style. And with time-tested construction practices that exceed industry standards, we make sure it’s a landscape that will last for generations. It will simply be a landscape you’ll love and one that will last!

Golombek6
In business for over 30 years, our own in-house crews provide consistent quality results for every project. Our team of experts incorporate your unique personality and ideas into a beautiful landscape design that makes your property stand out. Whether you’re looking for a soothing oasis, a great backyard to entertain friends and family, or professional gardens and walkways, we bring your vision to life.

profile:
Design Turf has a 20-year history of selling ProGreen artificial grass products in the GTA and beyond. Our residential grass series has a brown fiber thatch producing a realistic looking grass and is 33% cooler than conventional turf. Plus, with the new patent-pending ProFlow backing that increases the drainage rate by approximately 400% and our moisture resistant fibers, the turf will be cleaner, drier and free from any unpleasant pet odors. Design Turf is also recognized for offering the highest quality of golf green products & for their professional installations. Design Turf golf greens are priced at $30/ft²+HST for full installation. A small 12’x15’, 2 hole backyard golf green can be as little as $7500+HST complete! 
 
Our most popular selling landscape turf averages $19/ft²+HST for full installation. All our turf is pet friendly and has excellent drainage! 
 
ProGreen manufacturing is the only North American artificial grass manufacturer to produce their products under one roof from start to finish. Our products are certifiably 100% LEAD & HEAVY METAL FREE!  ProGreen products have a life expectancy of 30-40 years, even under the harshest of conditions, including the play of multiple dogs or when used by busy daycare centers!
 
For the Do-It-Yourselfer
Design Turf’s price on Natural Prime 50 for supply only is just $6.20/ft²+HST (remember it supplied only and the rolls are 15' wide!). Find out how to install it yourself here!
 
Please contact us! Provide a daytime phone number, email address and street address, we ’ll be happy to show you samples and arrange a free quotation.

We're fully insured, enthusiasic and extremely service oriented.

profile:
There are too many renovation companies in the industry but there is not many like The Renovation Monsters.
Our home renovation business serves Toronto and surrounding areas including Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Richmond, Thornhill, Maple. 

We have been in business for over 15 years and we understand that your home is a special place and we promise to always do our best to ensure customer satisfaction. 

Since day one our mission has been to fully understand each customers home renovation needs.

As a full-service contractor, we have the experience and proven skills to take on all your home renovation requirements and complete the project so its done right, on time and within budget.

Whether you live in Oakville, Hamilton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto or the surrounding area, trust your home renovation to The Renovation Monsters!

profile:
bsq Landscape Architects offers full Landscape Design and Landscape Planning and Development.

We can  also provide the oversight and management to source the appropriate sub-trades for the installation of pools and spas, complete lighting and irrigation systems and custom specialty woodwork and metal work.  

Full tender packages can be produced for any residential or commercial project with a complete set of landscape working drawings and details, itemized construction budgets and construction phasing.  

We are a company that wants to stand out as leaders in sustainable landscape design and construction and also as a company that is not only conscious of the environmental impacts of landscape construction but also as a company that leads by example in this regard.
service_area: b sq. Design Studio creates and builds landscapes predominately within the Greater Toronto Area. To date we have worked extensively ...
products:
b sq. Design Studio provide full design services from conceptual plans, to 3-D colour renderings and full Landscape Master-plans.
We also build and construct residential landscape and gardens for new homes as well as performing full garden renovations.
services:
b sq. Design Studio offers full Landscape Design and Landscape Construction services for all residential and commercial projects. We can work with a wide range of project sizes from small garden renovations to complete landscapes for a new home construction.

Our staff has the knowledge and experience to apply for and obtain all necessary zoning inquiries, permits and TRCA and Forestry approvals.
diplomas: Dip. Landscape Architecture and Bachelors Degree in Landscape Architecture
